Dirt Block.Description: An extracted chunk of terrestrial matter excavated from the soil.

Stone Block.Description: A quarry-derived mass of mineral matter excavated from the earth.

Wood Block.Description: lumber obtained through the felling and milling of arboreal organisms.

Copper Ore.Description: A subterranean deposit of cupriferous minerals extracted from the earth.

Iron Ore.Description: naturally occurring ferrous mineral extracted from subterranean deposits.

Gold Ore.Description: naturally occurring auriferous mineral extracted from subterranean deposits.

Diamond Ore.Description: naturally occurring carbonado extracted from subterranean deposits.

Jadeite.Description: naturally occurring sodium- and aluminium-rich pyroxene extracted from subterranean deposits.

Platinum Ore.Description: One of the rarest ores, platiniferous mineral from the deepest levels of the earth
